revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Thrifty Megamart |image = [[File:Thrifty Megamart.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Thrifty Megmart. |tokens = 1,025,000 |location = South of Tapu Village }}
<!--T:2--> '''Thrifty Megamart''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. The [[Gyms#Alola|Ghostium-Z]] [[File:GhostiumZ.png|30px]] is awarded upon clearing this dungeon. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 14,705,422 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
